name: Kabuto

evolution.description: Kabuto can evolve into Kabutops at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Shellfish Pokémon. A Pokémon that was recovered from a fossil. It used the eyes on its back while hiding on the seafloor.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is doubled in rainy conditions.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to extra damage dealt by a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.description: When an attack hits this Pokémon, its speed increases by 5 feet, but its AC is temporarily reduced by 1 until the end of battle (for a maximum reduction of -5).
